Package EventHandlers

Class Summary
AddCountryListener Class that listens to user presses of the "Add Country" menu item in the "edit" menu.
AddEdgeListener Listens to presses of the "Add Edge" menu item in the "Edit" menu.
DeleteListener An object of this class listens to presses of the "Delete" menu item in the "Edit" menu of the user interface.
OpenListener An object of this class listens to presses of the "Open" menu item of the "File" menu of the main user interface.
PopupListener This has to be the most complicated of all the event handlers.
SaveListener An object of this class listens to presses of the "Save" item menu of the "File" menu.
ShowCountriesDetailsListener This class listens to "Show Countries Details" menu item presses in the "View" menu.
ShowGlobalLogListener Objects of this class listen to "Show Global Log" menu item presses of the "View" menu.
ShowGlobalLogListener.LogView This class extends JFrame.
ShowGlobalLogListener.LogView.LogViewText An object of this class keeps a reference to the global log.
ShowStateLogListener Objects of this class listen to "Show State Log" menu item presses of the "View" menu.
ShowStateLogListener.LogView This class extends JFrame.
ShowStateLogListener.LogView.LogViewText Objects of this class take care of holding the text that needs to be displayed.
StageController An object of this class listens to when the user starts a simulation.
